goal.ch: “In real world, because of uncertainty, probability is used to describe variety of phenomena. If models are involved in time,  we call them stochastic processes. Students are required to understand each process through thinking problems and doing homework; moreover, students are supposed to know how to derive easy results by computing or applying theorems.“
goal.en: “In real world, because of uncertainty, probability is used to describe variety of phenomena. If models are involved in time,  we call them stochastic processes. Students are required to understand each process through thinking problems and doing homework; moreover, students are supposed to know how to derive easy results by computing or applying theorems.“

outline.ch: “We will cover Markov Chains, Renewal Theory and Point Process.“
outline.en: “We will cover Markov Chains, Renewal Theory and Point Process.“

textbook.ch: Adventures in Stochastic Processes by Sidney I. Resnick.
textbook.en: Adventures in Stochastic Processes by Sidney I. Resnick.

gradMethod.ch: Homework: 60％; midterm Exam: 20％ and final exam: 20％.
gradMethod.en: Homework: 60％; midterm Exam: 20％ and final exam: 20％.
